thread.title: 10 Best Dressed Celebrities on the Grammys 2017 Red Carpet
thread.title_full: 10 Best Dressed Celebrities on the Grammys 2017 Red Carpet

author: Chelsea Peng
title: 10 Best Dressed Celebrities on the Grammys 2017 Red Carpet
text:
Perfection from head to clear-strapped toe (with Gucci in between). Getty 2 Of 10 Celine Dion 
Sure, the emerald color and lush embellishment on her Zuhair Murad Couture dress are grand, but Dion's megawatt smile is the best detail. Getty 3 Of 10 Blue Ivy 
Honestly, why do the rest of us even try when this 5-year-old in this Gucci suit exists? Getty 4 Of 10 Halsey 
It wouldn't be the Grammys without some (or a lot of) flesh on display, but with this Christian Wijnants set, the eye-catching cobalt gets a share of the gaze too. Getty 5 Of 10 Santigold 
The undisputed color of the moment + Gucci, one of today's most talked-about designers = a pretty, purposefully prim outing. Getty
